Face anti-spoofing: In the internship, I developed a deep-learning model for face anti-spoofing that analyzed facial features and detected any anomalies or inconsistencies that may indicate a spoofing attempt. The model is available on GitHub and achieved acceptable performance metrics, providing a valuable tool for secure biometric systems.
